Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located at signalized intersection of N Main Street and Stone Avenue
+/- 24,800 Vehicles Per Day on Stone Ave
Building Signage Available

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Recently completed, Main+Stone includes retail and restaurant space, anchored by 292 luxury apartments. This unique and innovative mixed use development is a great addition to Greenville’s flourishing Downtown community of over ninety restaurants and pubs. Retailers of Main+Stone will have the opportunity for
exposure to approximately 75,215 residents within three miles of the store fronts and 22,000 employees within one mile of the development.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 300,000 Vehicles Per Day on E Stone Ave
Located right on Greenville's downtown Main St.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
•	+/-10,116 SF available in the basement level with a dedicated stairwell from N Main Street 
•	Ideal for retail or creative office use
•	Building Signage Available on N Main Street
•	Additional access to suite through passenger elevator and freight elevator

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: 125 N Main St 125 N Main St - Image 3
125 N Main St 125 N Main St - Image 4

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located just two blocks from Greenville’s North Main Street and along two
of the city’s most important thoroughfares, the 21,805 sq. ft of ground-floor
commercial space is well-positioned to serve the residents of Canvas Lofts, the
North Main Street business district, and the surrounding Hampton Pinckney
neighborhood.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Retail space will feature 20’ ceilings, storefront glass, and architectural details
that will position the building as an ideal location for restaurateurs, creative
office users, and neighborhood-serving retailers.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Great location with only a short drive to Downtown Greenville and just a few miles from Furman University.
